sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_1307894_cmms_model"> <x_1307894_cmms_model action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <aem_approved_date/> <alarms/> <asset_type display_value="Chiller, Reciprocal">bcef346d93314210397dbd6cebba104f</asset_type> <assigned_to/> <classification/> <display_name/> <eol_date/> <identifier/> <internal_notes/> <known_as/> <last_pm_review_date>2023-05-15</last_pm_review_date> <maintenance>Schedules: 3 month, 1 year Procedures: 3 month Verify the following checks have been performed by the outside contractor: Check refrigerant charge Check oil level and condition of oil Check efficiency output of compressor Check operation of unloaders and check pump down cycle Check motors: lubricate bearings as needed; check leads for tightness; Check sheaves and/or couplings for alignment and securing to shafts; Check and record motor voltage and amperage Check fans: lubricate and check alignment of bearings for wear or any unusual noise; check belt tension and wear; check all sheaves and wheels for alignment and tightness Check starter and switches: thoroughly clean out all dust and dirt from inside of cabinet; check for loose screws and springs; check all release mechanisms for proper operation. Check unit for proper water flow (if applicable Instruct operator (if applicable) Report all detected deficiences to owner
1 year Verify the following checks have been performed by the outside contractor: Check refrigerant charge Check oil level Take oil sample for spectrographic analysis Check efficiency output of compressor(s) Megger compressor motor(s) Check operation of unloaders Check pump down cycle Leak check unit with electronic leak detector Check motors: lubricate bearings as needed; check leads for tightness; Check sheaves and/or couplings for alignment and securing to shafts; Check and record motor voltage and amperage (if applicable) Check fans: lubricate and check alignment of bearings for wear or any unusual noise; check belt tension and wear; check all sheaves and wheels for alignment and tightness (if applicable) Check starter and switches: thoroughly clean out all dust and dirt from inside of control cabinet; check for loose screws and springs; check all release mechanisms for proper opertaion; clean contacts Check operation of all controls and adjust to design specifications Change liquid line drier cores (if applicable) Check unit for proper water flow (if applicable) Remove condenser end bell & conduct tube brushing on water cooled unit Report all detected deficiencies to owner Complete operational log of unit(s) ****** Effective 1/1/2011 per Calif Air Resources Board (CARB), Title 40 of the Code of Federal Regulation, Part 82: All facilities with stationary non-residential refrigeration systems w/more than 50 lbs of refrigerant are required to perform leak detection inspections, leak repairs and recordkeeping. (Systems using ammonia or carbon dioxide are excluded from this requirement.) Have U.S. Env. Protection Agency-certified technician perform leak detection, including repairing leaks prior to recharging and properly evacuating cylinders before disposal. Document all work performed in service history. csimpson 3/21/11
Performed by: vendor</maintenance> <maintenance_intervals/> <maintenance_standard>Matches other regulatory requirements</maintenance_standard> <maintenance_strategy>Preventive/Scheduled</maintenance_strategy> <manufacturer display_value="Gradint/Coldhead">d6f67ced93fd0210397dbd6cebba1037</manufacturer> <model_name>100P6R407C</model_name> <model_number>100P6R407C</model_number> <network_capability/> <phi_storage/> <picture/> <probability>3</probability> <processed_by/> <proposed_on/> <proposer_reviewed/> <reason_for_no_pm/> <references/> <risk/> <risk_score>6</risk_score> <severity>2</severity> <state>Active</state> <sub_state/> <sys_class_name>x_1307894_cmms_model</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-26 03:24:02</sys_created_on> <sys_id>38b3ed2d93f14210397dbd6cebba10e9</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-04-26 19:51:40</sys_updated_on> <system/> <udi/> <useful_life_yrs/> <website/> </x_1307894_cmms_model> </record_update>
